name: Spectre Shop Scramble
description:
A quick game made for the #SoloDevelopment Halloween Game Jam. Theme was ghosts doing normal people things. There is 5 minutes until the mall closes and you are throwing a party so you need to find as many of the things on your list of Halloween party supplies before the mall closes the more you find the better your rating. Ratings are as follows from best to worst a Beyond a Rave Grave, a Gravedigger Disco, a Black Cat Boogie,  a Bummer Ball, or a Godawful Gala. There are 30 items in total to find and 15 different types of items. WASD to move around mouse to look SPACE to jump and CTRL to crouch.

I created all Assets for the game in the 3 days except the characters which was a base character that I edited and I had the tombstones already built. Floor, Ceiling and Wall textures are from Textures.com. I used 3 songs in my game Tip Toes, and Skeleton Dance by Myuu  and Spooky Ride by Twin Musicom.

Check out my game on Steam Wildemist Isle a 3D open world adventure game with card based battles: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1227100/Wildemist_Isle/
